title: Good times two
creator_credit: Michael G. Ryan, Oxley Hughan, Geoffrey Scott and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: This film tells of the adventures of two Australian girls on a flying visit to New Zealand. As they travel the country the girls are seen against a giant backdrop - New Zealand itself. Nearly all of it is shown - forests, farms, the rivers and lakes, ski-fields, and beaches, the volcanoes, and the cities…a lively introduction to New Zealand.
